characters.description: A mischievous and adventurous boy, Tom is the protagonist of the story. He is imaginative and often seeks excitement, leading him into various escapades.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a mischievous grin, tousled brown hair, and bright eyes. He wears simple, slightly rumpled clothes typical of the mid-19th century, perhaps a loose shirt and trousers. He might be holding a slingshot or a piece of chalk. The background should suggest a small-town setting, perhaps with a wooden fence or a glimpse of a river.

An elderly woman with a kind but firm face, gray hair pulled back in a bun, and spectacles perched on her nose. She wears a simple, modest dress and a shawl. Her expression should convey a mix of love and exasperation. The background could be a cozy, old-fashioned kitchen or parlor.
characters.description: Tom's kind but strict aunt, she cares for him deeply despite his misbehavior. She is often conflicted between her duty to discipline him and her love for him.
A free-spirited outcast, Huck is Tom's closest friend and partner in adventure. He is independent, resourceful, and often clashes with the constraints of society.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a wild, unkempt appearance, often barefoot and dressed in ragged, oversized clothes. He has a mischievous glint in his eyes and a carefree expression. He might be holding a pipe or a dead cat. The setting could be a riverbank or a ramshackle shed.

characters.description: Tom's well-behaved and somewhat priggish half-brother, Sid is often the foil to Tom's mischief. He is a quiet and obedient boy.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with neat, combed hair and a serious expression. He wears clean, well-fitting clothes. He should look prim and proper. The background could be a tidy, organized room or a church setting.

A young girl with a sweet, gentle face and neatly styled hair. She wears a simple, modest dress. Her expression should convey kindness and patience. The background could be a comfortable, domestic setting.
characters.description: Tom's kind and gentle cousin, Mary is a good influence on him. She is patient and understanding.

characters.portrait_prompt: A menacing man with a dark complexion, long black hair, and a sinister expression. He has a prominent scar or patch over one eye. He wears ragged, dark clothing and might be holding a knife or a weapon. The setting could be a dark, shadowy place or a desolate landscape.
characters.description: A dangerous and vengeful half-Native American man, Injun Joe is the main antagonist of the story. He is a ruthless and violent criminal.
Tom's close friend and fellow adventurer, Joe is a loyal and enthusiastic companion. He is easily led by Tom's ideas.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a friendly, eager face and a slightly mischievous grin. He wears simple, practical clothes and might be holding a toy sword or a stick. The background could be a forest or a riverbank.

A young girl with a pretty, delicate face, blue eyes, and long yellow hair often styled in braids. She wears a neat, fashionable dress and a bonnet. Her expression should convey a mix of sweetness and pride. The background could be a schoolhouse or a garden.
characters.description: Tom's love interest, Becky is a pretty and spirited girl. She is initially drawn to Tom's adventurous nature but is also easily offended.

characters.portrait_prompt: A middle-aged man with a worn, haggard face, often looking confused or frightened. He wears simple, tattered clothes. He might be holding a knife or a mug. The background could be a graveyard or a jail cell.
characters.description: A kind but weak-willed town drunk, Muff Potter is wrongly accused of murder. He is often the victim of circumstance and manipulation.
A girl who was previously Tom's love interest, she is quickly forgotten when Becky Thatcher arrives. She is somewhat vain and easily jealous.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young girl with a pretty, but slightly spoiled face. She wears a nice dress and might have a ribbon in her hair. Her expression should convey a mix of sweetness and vanity. The background could be a schoolhouse or a party setting.
A young boy with a simple, somewhat naive face. He wears typical schoolboy clothes. He might be holding an apple or a toy. The background could be a schoolyard or a riverbank.
characters.description: A boy who is easily tricked by Tom, Ben is one of Tom's schoolmates. He is gullible and somewhat envious of Tom's adventures.

characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a somewhat smug face. He wears neat, fashionable clothes. He might be trying to shake hands with someone important. The setting could be a school or a public gathering.
characters.description: Becky's cousin, Jeff is a boy who is sometimes a rival to Tom. He is often seen trying to impress others.
The stern and somewhat pedantic schoolmaster, Mr. Dobbins is often the target of the boys' pranks. He has a secret desire to be a doctor.
characters.portrait_prompt: A middle-aged man with a stern, serious face, a bald head covered by a wig, and a stiff collar. He wears a formal suit and might be holding a book or a ferule. The background could be a schoolroom with a blackboard.

characters.description: Becky's father, Judge Thatcher is a respected figure in the town. He is impressed by Tom's bravery and resourcefulness.
characters.portrait_prompt: A middle-aged man with a dignified, imposing appearance, iron-gray hair, and a serious expression. He wears a formal suit and might be holding a book or a gavel. The background could be a courtroom or a formal setting.
A young man with a clean-shaven face and a serious expression. He wears a professional-looking suit or coat. The background could be a doctor's office or a graveyard.
characters.description: A young doctor who is murdered by Injun Joe, he is a relatively minor character but his death sets the plot in motion.
A young enslaved boy who works for Aunt Polly, Jim is often tasked with chores and is sometimes the target of Tom's pranks.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young African American boy with a simple, earnest face. He wears simple, worn clothes. He might be carrying a bucket or doing chores. The setting could be a backyard or a woodpile.

A slim man of about 35 with a sandy goatee and short sandy hair. He wears a stiff standing-collar and a broad cravat. He might be holding a hymn book. The background could be a church or a school setting.
characters.description: The Sunday school superintendent, Mr. Walters is a well-meaning but somewhat pompous figure. He is often shown trying to impress visitors.

characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a very neat and tidy appearance. He wears spotless clothes and a white handkerchief. His expression is overly virtuous. The background could be a church or a school setting.
characters.description: The model boy of the village, Willie is hated by the other boys for his perfect behavior. He is often used as an example of good conduct.

characters.portrait_prompt: An elderly woman with a wrinkled face and a mysterious expression. She might be wearing a shawl and a bonnet. The setting could be a dark forest or a small, old house.
characters.description: An old woman considered a witch by the townspeople, she is mentioned in connection with superstitions.

characters.portrait_prompt: An older African American man with a kind face. He wears simple work clothes and might be carrying a bucket or doing chores. The setting could be a backyard or a woodpile.
characters.description: A kind and helpful enslaved man who works for Ben Rogers' family, he is friendly to Huck.

characters.portrait_prompt: An old man with a kind, honest face, and gray hair. He wears simple, practical clothes. The background could be a house on a hill or a forest setting.
characters.description: A kind and helpful man who lives on Cardiff Hill, he helps Huck and protects the Widow Douglas.

characters.portrait_prompt: A middle-aged woman with a kind but worried face. She wears simple, dark clothing. Her expression should convey a mix of love and concern. The background could be a domestic setting or a church.
characters.description: Joe Harper's mother, she is a kind and emotional woman. She is often seen grieving for her son.

characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a neat, somewhat arrogant appearance. He wears fashionable clothes and might be holding a book or a picture. The setting could be a schoolhouse or a social gathering.
characters.description: A boy from St. Louis who is seen as a rival by Tom. He is somewhat arrogant and is used by Becky to make Tom jealous.

characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a simple, ordinary appearance. He wears typical schoolboy clothes. The setting could be a street or a backyard.
characters.description: A boy who owns a wagon that Tom borrows.

characters.portrait_prompt: A middle-aged woman with a plain but kind face. She wears simple, modest clothing. The setting could be a domestic setting.
characters.description: A woman in the town, she is a friend of Aunt Polly. She is mentioned in connection with a dream.
A boy mentioned in connection with spunk-water and warts.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a somewhat mischievous appearance. He wears simple clothes and might be holding a bean or have warts on his hands. The setting could be a street or a backyard.
A young boy with a simple, ordinary appearance. He wears typical schoolboy clothes. The setting could be a street or a backyard.
characters.description: A boy mentioned in connection with spunk-water and warts.
A boy mentioned in connection with spunk-water and warts. He is also seen as a judge in a cat trial.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a serious, thoughtful appearance. He wears typical schoolboy clothes. The setting could be a schoolyard or a mock courtroom.

characters.description: A girl who is mentioned as having an accident and burning herself.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young girl with a simple, ordinary appearance. She wears typical schoolgirl clothes. The setting could be a school or a domestic setting.

characters.description: A girl who is mentioned as being at the picnic.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young girl with a simple, ordinary appearance. She wears typical schoolgirl clothes. The setting could be a school or a picnic setting.
A young girl with a simple, ordinary appearance. She wears typical schoolgirl clothes. The setting could be a school or a picnic setting.

A girl who is mentioned as being at the picnic.
characters.portrait_prompt: A young girl with a simple, ordinary appearance. She wears typical schoolgirl clothes. The setting could be a school or a picnic setting.

characters.description: A kind and wealthy woman in the town. She is generous and takes Huck under her wing.
characters.portrait_prompt: A middle-aged woman with a kind, gentle face and a dignified appearance. She wears elegant but modest clothing. The background could be a well-furnished house or a church setting.
A large, sad-looking dog with drooping ears and a mournful expression. He might be a mixed breed with a shaggy coat. The setting could be a dark street or a run-down building.
characters.description: A dog that howls outside the tannery.

characters.portrait_prompt: A young boy with a pale and peaceful face. He is dressed in simple, modest clothing. The setting could be a graveyard or a quiet, somber room.
characters.description: A boy who recently died.
